data.eml:eml: Three new species of genus Mecopoda Serville, 1831 from China (Orthoptera: Tettigoniidae: Mecopodinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Liu, Yun-Fei, Shen, Chu-Ze, Gong, Pu, Zhang, Ling, He, Zhu-Qing (2019): Three new species of genus Mecopoda Serville, 1831 from China (Orthoptera: Tettigoniidae: Mecopodinae). Zootaxa 4585 (3): 561-572, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4585.3.10
